Compute Euclidean Distance

Source: R/anomaly_detection.R
compute_euclidean.Rd

Compute Euclidean Distance

Usage

compute_euclidean(ms_tbl, output_var, grp_vars = c("site", "concept_id"))

Arguments

ms_tbl

output from compute_dist_mean_median() where the cross-joined table from compute_at_cross_join() is used as input

output_var

the output variable that should be used to compute the Euclidean distance i.e. a count or proportion

grp_vars

vector of grouping variables; the euclidean distance will be computed per group

Value

one dataframe with all variables from ms_tbl with the addition of columns with a site Loess value and a site Euclidean distance value

On this page
